title: Ground News - She was trapped in a marriage for 10 years. Now she helps other 'chained' Orthodox Jewish women.
text:
Summary by Business Insider Rifka Meyer, the co-founder of GETToutUK and the owner of Rifka's Salon.Tori Ferenc for BISitting in her home on a leafy street in North West London, Rifka Meyer looks fondly at a framed photograph hanging above her dining room table.The image, taken at her wedding, features her now-husband and the nine children — five hers, four his — who now form their blended family."I'm extremely happily married," she says.But she wasn't always.Meyer, a devo… Share menu More
